21. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to enable an understanding of whether and how
the undertaking engages, as part of its ongoing due diligence process, with value chain workers
and their legitimate representatives, or with credible proxies, about material actual and
potential positive and/or negative impacts that do or are likely to affect them, and whether and
how perspectives of value chain workers are taken into account in the decision-making
processes of the undertaking.
